name: Squares Demo 1
description:
This game is a DEMO of my upcoming game  Squares : Ultimate Mayhem . 

I am still working on this so, there are so many bugs. I would release another demo shortly. It will have new textures which I am currently working on. 

controls :

W , A , S , D or DIRECTIONAL KEYS : Movement 

MOUSE : Aim

SPACE or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON : Shoot
